COMMONS.LICENCES_TEXT:
The source code of the DEWETRA application and all its Derivative Works (MyDEWETRA, MyDEWETRA Word, and all applications in the suite) is released as Open Source under the EUPL license.
The code integrates third-party components, which are also distributed under open source licenses compatible with the EUPL license.
"In case of conflict between the licensee's obligations under the EUPL license and those arising from the licenses of the integrated components, the obligations prescribed by the compatible license shall prevail, pursuant to the compatibility clause."
